text: Swann VR is a spatial memory training tool for Alzheimer's disease. It uses virtual reality. Users are given a map with objects placed in it, and they are to memorize it and find the items within the immersive environment. It was created by Taegh Sokhey a product management executive and Northwestern University graduate. The application is designed to work with Oculus Rift and Rift S. ==References== Category:Dementia
title: Swann VR
